entry.definition: Actual number of steps in the molecular dynamics simuations.

description.h:p: May be less that the requested number of steps, if the time was not set properly.

description.h:p: This describes the step-wise analysis of configurations.

entry.definition: Method used for evaluating the electrostatic energy

description.h:p: Number of equilibration steps requested by the user.

entry.definition: Module in which the final averages and standard deviations are presented.
Type of periodic boundary conditions used

description.h:p: Set as a parameter in the CONFIG file.
Deduced at the end of the job.

entry.definition: Flag concerning use of link cells

description.h:p: Only provided if true; set by default in CONTROL file
Array of character strings. Defined in the FIELD file.

entry.definition: Number of configurations over which the average properties have been obtained.

description.h:p: Formed by counting the number of configurations reported in the STATIS file.

entry.definition: Number of different types of molecules

description.h:p: Obtained from the FIELD file, but must be consistent with the CONFIG file.

entry.definition: Number of molecules of each type (array)

description.h:p: Obtained from the FIELD file, but must be consistent with the CONFIG file.

entry.term: number of sites in each molecule type
entry.definition: Number of atomic sites within each type of molecule (array)
Number of time steps in the simulation

description.h:p: Number of steps requested by the user in the CONTROL file.

entry.definition: Number of configurations whose properties are given in the STATIS file

description.h:p: Read from the OUTPUT file, and not used to form the average properties.
Pair distribution data (called the radial distribution function by DL_POLY) are stored in the RDFDAT file. Data are given pair-wise rather than merged.
Pressure of the sample set by the user in the CONTROL file. It is the pressure used in constant pressure/stress algorithms.
Set by the user in the CONTROL file.
Used as the abscissa for the plots of the pair distribution function.

entry.definition: Total number of rotational degrees of freedom.
Total number of degrees of freedom associated with atomic shells
Interval between writing data statistics to the STATIS file

entry.term: Standard deviation of the total energy
entry.definition: Standard deviation of the total energy, potential + kinetic

entry.definition: Standard deviation of the total temperature (rotational + translation)

description.h:p: Temperature selected by the user through the CONTROL file. It is used as the temperature for a constant-T algorithm or the target for temperature scaling in the equilibration stage.
Set by user in CONTROL file.

entry.definition: Time interval between temperature scaling steps

description.h:p: Set by user in CONTROL file.

entry.definition: Flag to indicate whether temperature scaling is on

description.h:p: Set by user in CONTROL file.
